Subject: RE: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE Renovation | (Bernardaud - Dubai Mall ) - Last trading day 18 July 2025.
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Kawttar, Team, 

 

Greetings, 

 

Since we are nearing the last trading date of Bernardaud, TDM for renovation, kindly see below the key dates for your reference, 

 

S.NO

TASK

RESPONSIBLE BY

DATE

1

LAST TRADING DAY

BU / OPERATIONS

18 JULY 2025.

2

HOARDING INSTALLATION

MALL CONTRACTOR / 3D

18 JULY 2025.

3

DE-MERCHANDISING 

BU / OPERATIONS

18 JULY TILL 19 JULY 2025.

4

STORE HANDOVER TO DEMOLITION WORKS

BU / OPERATIONS

20 JULY 2025

5

DEMOLITIONS WORKS TO START

MALL CONTRACTOR / 3D

20 JULY 2025.

 

Kindly revert for any clarifications.

Thanks & Regards

prathap pandiyan	
project manager ‑ projects delivery	
	
 <https://www.linkedin.com/company/3d-develop-design-deliver>

www.3d-consultants.com <http://3d-consultants.com/>  
	
A company by Chalhoub group

ein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com>; Shant Daldalian <Shant.Daldalian@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE Renovation | (Bernardaud - Dubai Mall )
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have an Update on the store closure for Renovation of  “Bernardaud TDM last trading date on 18th Jul and Handover on 20th Jul.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Mohamed Jaafar <mailto:Mohamed.Jaafar@chalhoub.com>  @Haitham Saheb <mailto:Haitham.Saheb@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	@Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com>  please fill up the attached form with qty, description and picture of non-stock should be stored in Warehouse and communicate with @Mohamed Jaafar <mailto:Mohamed.Jaafar@chalhoub.com>  of SR need to be raised in One Reach.
*	@Nour Saab <mailto:Nour.Saab@chalhoub.com>  to confirm regarding the Chandelier pick up and storage location.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit with Updated dated (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment and CCTV cameras dismantling ) @Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com> @Bernardaud Dubai Mall <mailto:Bernardaud.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 18th Jul after trading hours. @Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com> @Bernardaud Dubai Mall <mailto:Bernardaud.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be packed and stored with Baccarat store @Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com> @Bernardaud Dubai Mall <mailto:Bernardaud.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 20th Jul before trading hours 
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  to convert the landline number to Abdullah Zamriq on 050 8740289.

*	IT Equipment dismantling on 20th Jul before trading hours by @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 

*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG team to collect all cash from boutique on 19thJul morning and freeze their service as well from 20th Jul.
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>   to Hold services on 19th Jul After trading hours (cleaning – pest control) till opening. 
*	@Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> @Pierre BAA SOLO <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to advice on BOH Shelving dismantling and storing with contractor.
*	@Alof Joseph <mailto:Alof.Joseph@chalhoub.com>  stock count to be conducted on 15th Jul

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK

Subject: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE Renovation | (Bernardaud - Dubai Mall )
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure for Renovation of  “Bernardaud TDM last trading date on 17th Jul and Handover on 19th Jul.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Haytham Alhamwi <mailto:Haytham.Alhamwi@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment and CCTV cameras dismantling ) @Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com> @Bernardaud Dubai Mall <mailto:Bernardaud.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 17th Jul after trading hours. @Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com> @Bernardaud Dubai Mall <mailto:Bernardaud.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @Mukesh Mehta <mailto:Mukeshkumar.Mehta@chalhoub.com> @Bernardaud Dubai Mall <mailto:Bernardaud.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Advice where it will be transferred  @noor <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com>  
*	Prepare a list of all assets existing furniture ( tables , sofa, podiums…etc that needs to be stored in Warehouse to raise One Reach SR.
